### About this resource
> [Laura Albert](https://directory.engr.wisc.edu/ie/Faculty/Albert_Laura/), professor and the David Gustafson Department Chair of Industrial & Systems Engineering at the UW–Madison College of Engineering discusses how artificial intelligence is changing the American business landscape.This is the 6th installment in our webinar series about AI.
